about_the_game:
This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed CSX GE B30-7 model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise games.

Features Include:
  • Night Lighting
  • Ditch Lights
  • Auto Running Numbers
  • Fan Animation
detailed_description:
This Downloadable Content Pack includes the highly detailed CSX GE B30-7 model for use in the Trainz Simulator franchise games.

Features Include:
  • Night Lighting
  • Ditch Lights
  • Auto Running Numbers
  • Fan Animation

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9
  • Processor: i5 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: i5 2.3 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics card with 1 GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel 'i' series/AMD K10 series introduced 2009 onwards. 2 physical cores, 2Ghz 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3330/AMD FX 8350 or better, Quad physical core, 64 bit, 2.3Ghz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better/ AMD HD 6950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
